rooms.description: Open and spacious living room with Art Deco finishes, incorporating geometric patterns, polished chrome accents, and a central marble coffee table. The layout is designed to ensure ample natural light and ease of movement for wheelchair accessibility.
Dining area adjoining the living room with sleek Art Deco styling, featuring a long table and complementary seating that accommodates easy access, ensuring no obstructions to wheelchair movement.

Modern kitchen with Art Deco design elements including chrome finishes and geometric patterns. Layout ensures wheelchair accessibility with lowered counters, wide pathways, and open-plan connectivity to the dining area.

Spacious master bedroom designed in Art Deco style with geometric patterns and elegant finishes. Includes a private balcony integrated into the design for outdoor relaxation while ensuring wheelchair accessibility through wider doorways and minimal step transitions.

Guest bedroom also styled in Art Deco aesthetics with streamlined furniture and a balcony to enjoy outdoor views. The room is designed to be wheelchair accessible with ample space for maneuverability.
Functional bathroom with modern fixtures, ensuring safety features like grab bars and wheelchair-accessible design. Incorporates Art Deco elements through geometric tile patterns and chrome accents.

openings.description: Accessible entrance with a ramp for wheelchair users, featuring an Art Deco-inspired facade with bold geometric shapes and vibrant finishes. The entrance leads directly to the living room area.
Sliding door leading from the master bedroom to its private balcony, designed to be wide and barrier-free for easy wheelchair access.
Sliding door opening from the guest bedroom to a smaller but equally accessible balcony space, maintaining aesthetic consistency with Art Deco style elements.

servants_quarters.description: Dedicated service room for staff with essential amenities and storage. Designed to be functional while adhering to Art Deco design aesthetics, with efficient space planning for ease of access.

vastu_considerations.main_entrance_direction: East facing entrance recommended for auspicious entry
vastu_considerations.master_bedroom_location: Placed in the north-east corner to promote health and stability
vastu_considerations.kitchen_position: Placed in the south-west area, ensuring proper distance from bedrooms for better Vastu compliance

wheelchair: Main entrance ramp installed with non-slip surface
Doorways widened to at least 36 inches
Low-level counters and switch placements in kitchen and bathrooms
No threshold obstacles throughout the interior design
